languages.text: "Муки телесные неизбежны. Так зачем же противиться им? Лелейте свои недуги, ибо истление тела есть путь к новому бытию!"
"Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"
languages.original_text: "Муки телесные неизбежны. Так зачем же противиться им? Лелейте свои недуги, ибо истление тела есть путь к новому бытию!"

traits.locale_text: "Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"
"Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"
"Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"
"Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"
"Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"
"Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"

languages.text: “身体的痛苦是无法逃避的，既然如此，那为什么还要抗拒它呢？珍惜你的苦难吧，因为身体的衰败会带来新生命的诞生！”
languages.original_text: "Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"

traits.locale_text: “身体的痛苦是无法逃避的，既然如此，那为什么还要抗拒它呢？珍惜你的苦难吧，因为身体的衰败会带来新生命的诞生！”

languages.text: 「肉体の苦しみから逃げることは出来ない。なら、なぜ逆らう？ 苦悩をを大切にするのだ。身体の腐敗は、新たな存在への道なのだから！」
languages.original_text: "Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"

traits.locale_text: 「肉体の苦しみから逃げることは出来ない。なら、なぜ逆らう？ 苦悩をを大切にするのだ。身体の腐敗は、新たな存在への道なのだから！」

languages.text: «El sufrimiento corporal es ineludible. ¿Por qué resistirse? ¡Aprecie sus aflicciones, pues la decadencia del cuerpo es el camino hacia una nueva existencia!».
languages.original_text: "Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"

traits.locale_text: «El sufrimiento corporal es ineludible. ¿Por qué resistirse? ¡Aprecie sus aflicciones, pues la decadencia del cuerpo es el camino hacia una nueva existencia!».

languages.text: "Körperliches Leid ist unvermeidlich. Warum sich also dagegen wehren? Lernt Eure Krankheiten zu lieben, denn der Verfall des Körpers ist der Pfad zu einer neuen Existenz!"
languages.original_text: "Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"

traits.locale_text: "Körperliches Leid ist unvermeidlich. Warum sich also dagegen wehren? Lernt Eure Krankheiten zu lieben, denn der Verfall des Körpers ist der Pfad zu einer neuen Existenz!"

languages.text: « La souffrance physique est inévitable, alors pourquoi y résister ? Chérissez vos maux, car le dépérissement du corps mène à une nouvelle existence ! »
languages.original_text: "Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"

traits.locale_text: « La souffrance physique est inévitable, alors pourquoi y résister ? Chérissez vos maux, car le dépérissement du corps mène à une nouvelle existence ! »

languages.text: "Bedensel acıdan kaçılamaz. O hâlde neden direnesin ki? Izdırabının değerini bil. Bedensel çürüme, yeni bir varoluşa giden yoldur!"
languages.original_text: "Bodily suffering is inescapable. Why resist it, then? Cherish your afflictions, for the body's decay is the path to a new existence!"

traits.locale_text: "Bedensel acıdan kaçılamaz. O hâlde neden direnesin ki? Idırabının değerini bil. Bedensel çürüme, yeni bir varoluşa giden yoldur!"
